title: Layer Content
description: An object describing the type, availability, and location of layer content.

layer.description: The layer ID this content belongs to, in the `3DTILES_layers` `layers` dictionary.

mimeType.description: The mime type of the layer content.

uri.description: A template URI pointing to layer content. Content exists wherever the availability bit is 1. The URI of each content is substituted with the tile's global level, x, y, and z (OCTREE only). All content must conform to the `mimeType`.

availability.description: An object describing the availability of layer content in the tileset. If content availability is 1 its corresponding tile availability must also be 1.
